unittitle_ssm: Jonathan Howard and Nicholas Anderson deed
abstract_ssm: One deed, dated 1813, between Jonathan Howard, Sheriff of Queens County, and Nicholas Anderson of New York, N.Y.  The deed grants Anderson land in Newtown in Queens County, which Howard had formerly seized from James Waldron for failing to pay his debts.
subject_ssm: Land titles |z New York (State) |z Queens County

heading_ssm: Jonathan Howard and Nicholas Anderson deed
